question.title: What is the primary symptom of Raynaud's phenomenon?

option_a.title: Pain in the fingers and toes

option_c.title: Raynaud's phenomenon is a rare condition

option_d.title: Raynaud's phenomenon is a type of vasculitis

correct_option.title: Pain in the fingers and toes
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
